name: YouTube 4chan
description:
Hate the new YouTube layout? Too bad! Now loathe it as you browse 4chan!

Still a work in progress but for the most part, it's working.

 - todo - 
postarea/buttons (need to make it beautiful)
navtop (title might need some font tweaking)
replies (change some colours and what not)
4chan extension/various userscripts (ya4cie, thread watcher/thread updater [4chanX] work, but still need work; especially that #tw)
